Main: ^Normally the planet is much more lively around this time of year, with locals and tourists alike enjoying the warmth of the Kettle's water.
^But ever since the Kettle has stopped supplying the place with hot water, the number of tourists has dwindled greatly and the villagers have become shut-ins.
^So, you helping us out with the Kettle, makes us appreciate you more than your little motherboard could ever know.
^To reach the Kettle, you have to go over towards the large cliffs to the right of the path that got you here.
^Good luck out there; you got this!
^But if you need help with the controls, talk to me again.
